name: Shadow Council: The Puppeteers
description: Lead the clique of influential rebels and destroy the authoritarian empire from within. Make protest actions with the help of puppet oppositionists, bribe the parliament, lead the revolution - do everything to please the overseas patrons!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7(x64) Processor: 2GHz Dual-core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1Gb DirectX 9.0c compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
